titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: ACTIVITY TREATMENT FUNCTION CODE - Description

div.p: ACTIVITY TREATMENT FUNCTION CODE is the same as attribute TREATMENT FUNCTION CODE.
The default codes 199 and 499 are only applicable for overseas health care providers.

ACTIVITY TREATMENT FUNCTION CODE is used by the Secondary Uses Service to derive the
Healthcare Resource Group
4. Failure to correctly populate this data element is likely to result in an incorrect Healthcare Resource Group, usually associated with lower levels of healthcare resource.
For further information, please refer to the NHS Digital website at: Payment by Results Guidance.
